name: The Figure Dungeon
description:
Hello everyone, there is another simple game called "The Figure Dungeon" or "The Dungeon of the Figures". So, this game basically a platformer-shooter. You're playing as a figure (a square, a triangle, or a circle), and each figure has its own abilities. The circle can teleport to the point you placed, the square can shoot, and the triangle can use a grapple gun. You have to platform, and kill enemies and bosses of course! So this game is simple and not too complicated. I hope you'll enjoy it! Good luck!

[By the way, read the "About" section in the game to figure out controls and some game mechanincs]

There is some of the game's soundtrack:

https://on.soundcloud.com/hNLcS
